Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Natoma
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Diversey, Oak Park Ave, Grand, Fullerton, Narragansett and Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Diversey, Oak Park Ave, Grand, Fullerton, Narragansett, then resume their normal service on Diversey, due to police activity near Diversey/Natoma.

Allow extra travel time.
